website_summaries.verdict: Watch over baby with a monitor that can see the room, whether in broad daylight or late at night.
pros: Temperature sensor lets caregiver know if room is too hot or cold
Different screen-viewing options available: single screen, split screen, and patrol mode
No ambient noise, such as humming or buzzing, on the parent end when baby is quiet
cons: Some users would like to see a clip built in so the parent unit can be attached to clothing
No lullabies like some other brands

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I know this is a baby monitor but I recently bought it to monitor my 80-year-old Dad who has recently been released from the hospital. It allows me to see if he needs something without him having to get frustrated since he is having trouble with picking his words. :( He is still able to live in his own house and we live basically next door. It is like he has his very own, personal nursing home but with much better care and attention. The speaker and talk functions are great too.
customer_reviews.author: B.J

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, parenting must have
customer_reviews.text: Its Awesome! You can easily change angles, zoom in/out, change sound sensitivity, battery option for the camera so if the power goes out, the camera doesn't. I like the talk to feature, where the parent can talk through the monitor and it comes out the speaker for the camera. E.g. "go to sleep baby boy/girl, lay down baby girl/boy". Single monitor for multiple cameras. Like most families we have multiple kids and can listen for if they wake up in the night. Oh yeah, its durable. Dropped the monitor on the concrete while keeping an eye on sleeping baby and trying to put up Christmas lights.
customer_reviews.author: Matt, Houston

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for parents of multiple children
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our two children. We have 1 camera in my 4 year old’s room and 1 camera set up on my infant’s room. Very easy to set up and use monitor. I love that you can easily toggle between both cameras and that the temperature is displayed as well. Picture quality is amazing and they even have a zoom in feature as well. I also love the temperature alert feature that you can determine to tell if the room gets too hot and/or too cold. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: the search is over
customer_reviews.text: If your like me you research to make sure you are getting a good quality product at a reduced cost. after all that is the whole point of these reviews. I searched and searched for a good quality video monitor that wouldn't break the bank. I was hoping to not spend over 100$ I believe I paid about 120$ for this. It has worked perfect for us! The only complaint is I wish you could play the music from the monitor. you can zoom in and out, get clear full color images. it has all the bells and whistles and goes the distance I need to be able to go out to my firepit in the back of my house.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Vtech Stands by the Product
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is a little bright on this unit, but overall it works well. Our parent unit stopped sending sound after about 6 months and after trouble shooting with Vtech, they stood behind their product and are sending us a new one, free of charge. I would definitely buy again from them.
customer_reviews.author: Keema Yallani

customer_reviews.title: Company is unresponsive
customer_reviews.text: I have had this monitor since 2015 when I had my first child. Since then, I purchased a second monitor set in February of this year. That set will not holding the charging cable, so we are constantly fiddling with it to get it in just the right spot so that the parent unit won't shut off. I have contacted the company twice and received no response. I like the monitor overall, but am very frustrated that I have a defective unit and can get no response from the company to fix the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stressing Less As a Mom of 6
customer_reviews.text: As a mom of 6 who lived without this little camera, it really took my stress away being able to watch from a distance without checking on the baby and waking him/her up. We had one for the baby and the toddlers room and continued to use them for many years. Now that our kids are grown we no longer use them and have gifted them to others but for many years loved them and their quality.
customer_reviews.author: 1CrazyLife4Me

customer_reviews.title: Works good for us
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera picture, the volume loudest setting is good. I like the high/low temperature warning. I wish it had a function to turn the music on from the parent unit, which you cannot do. Other than that it’s fine. It reaches to my neighbors house but not if you go inside their house. The battery is not great. We turn it on at 7pm and it’s already beeping at 9:30/10 for a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Giambalvo

customer_reviews.title: Buy a bigger set if you even think you need more than 2 cams.
customer_reviews.text: Decent set of cameras. Field of view isnt the best and if you are on a mode where cameras are cycling, the zoom feature remains active on all cameras instead of just being able to select say the one camera aimed at the bed. Also, this set can pair with up to 2 more cameras, but a single camera costs nearly as much as this entire setup.
customer_reviews.author: Xhunter73

customer_reviews.title: Superior product
customer_reviews.text: Product worked perfectly. The night vision was clear the audio was clean and loud the range was good enough to be used upstairs or even in the next house. I can’t imagine there would be a better product out there and the price was reasonable. I kept both units plugged in so I didn’t learn about battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Staser

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep an eye on my mother who was sick with cancer and had dementia. We were able to see if she was awake or sleeping soundly. Picture quality was clear enough. Not perfect but did the job. We were very dependent on using this unplugged. Charge life last up to 2 hours. We wish it had been longer. But we were happy enough with it
customer_reviews.author: Marie G.

customer_reviews.title: Elderly Care monitor
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture and "parent unit" sound. Works outside. Negative only that "baby monitor" sound can NOT be easily heard by elderly mother with hearing aidsover other sounds in the room. That makes it useless for me to talk to her. However,I can hear her just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good range
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have farm animals, I needed a good camera that had night vision and that had a long range. This works great, I have both the cameras and the monitor plugged in all the time so I can’t speak about battery life. The only thing I wish I could change or turn off is the temperature alert, the tone can be turned off but the flashing banner at the top drives me crazy. Overall if buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Can't be placed by window
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but I had to rearrange the nursery. The way I had the camera, there was a window close by. I could not see the picture on the screen during the daytime even when I closed the blinds and curtains. Once I moved it away from the window, the picture cleared up and worked as expected. Volume is very good on it. Temperature gauge is not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Not a complicated baby monitor. I really like the fact that you can monitor the temp in the room. It does not connect to the internet so you do not have to worry about anyone hacking into your monitor. Customer service is friendly in case you have any questions. This monitor is not for those that need something complex or to connect to the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg Popov

customer_reviews.title: A Blessing and Necessity for Caregivers of people of any age
customer_reviews.text: Oh my. This is so very easy to set up. i used it while caring for my dear lovely mom. The two monitors were stationed in her room, at different angles - and i had the viewing monitor with me. There is sight and sound. If you wish, there is also a setting for lullaby type music which i didn't use. i just really needed to see and hear if my mom needed me. You'll not regret this. Vetch's Safe & Sound Video Baby is a MUST for caregivers for those of any age. i didn't even realize the potential until Amazon sent a general info email last Thanksgiving time.
customer_reviews.author: raggs

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor and customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy with this monitor. We had a WiFi monitor and hated it because it cut in and out. We went with this model and it’s so great. It has a sensitivity setting that allows for us not to hear the sound machine constantly until our baby cries. We like to sleep in silence. Great feature! We had a problem with the screen and they immediately send a replacement. We are very happy with the product and customer service offered by vtech.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot. I been using it for about 2 months now and it works great. The sound will stay off until the baby or toddler makes noise. The sound will still stay off even if you have a fan in the room running or an A/C unit. However if the fan is oscillating the sound will stay on. You can zoom in once with the unit which isn't bad and you can move the zoom around to focus what you want it on. The display will give you a warning when the temp gets to high. It is very easy to use and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff and Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this monitor. I’ve used it for all three of my kids. The night vision and temperature warnings are amazing! I love the talk option so I can communicate with my kids through the camera. Battery life could use some work but as long as you don’t leave the monitor unplugged all night it’s great! It has multiple viewing options for multi camera. Fully recommend this baby monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Windy

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 camera's and one parent unit in May/June 2016. We liked the cameras and felt that they worked very well with the exceptions of the cameras could be smaller and the lullabies should be controlled by the parental unit. Updated: Only Camera 2 was used regularly as it was the one mounted in the nursery and Camera 1 was only used when baby was sleeping outside of the nursery (not often). I went to use Camera 1 for the first time in a very long time on December 1 and the light on the camera turned yellow and the parent unit would not connect to this camera. The parent unit connected fine to camera 2.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!  Totally would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We love this monitor and camera unit!!!! The neatest thing is that when you have more than one camera, you can set the parent unit to "patrol mode" which rotates between your children's rooms about every 5 seconds or so. The zoom in feature works great, and the kids love when we are able to speak to them from downstairs to let them know we will be up soon and that we hear them! I would totally recommend this to anyone! (I'm a mom of a 4 year old, 2 year old and 7 month old)
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Earley

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Great little monitor. I actually used it to monitor my elderly mother's room. She had severe dementia qnd this allowed me to easily keep an eye on her when I was in another part of the house. It gave me more peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great monitor. We had a different brand before this one, but I needed a second camera and it had been discontinued. I searched online and found the VTech monitor. I like that I can set the sensitivity for each camera to a different level. I don't need to hear every little sound my toddler makes, so I changed the setting to the least sensitive option; however, I do need to hear my infant, so I set that sensitivity to the most sensitive. It works great. I never have signal issues whether I am inside or outside. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Q

customer_reviews.title: great camera that does not drop link like a lot of the other monitors
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this camera for a year and a half with no problems at all. It does what it advertises and does it well. We have had other video monitors that were just not as well made and stopped working correctly (usually not staying linked and dropping link in the middle of the night). This camera never drops link. The infrared seems better on this camera, although the brightness/intensity changes on screen a lot
customer_reviews.author: Paul N. Maghielse

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. i use it to observe my new dogs and remind them not to bark when i leave and return home. I'm sure it will come in handy when I travel and need to leave them in a room for a few minutes. The ability to talk to them from a distance is amazing and they respond with a puzzled look on their faces which is fun. Training dogs not to bark when not there is nearly impossible but this is helping a lot. It's well made and easy to work. Recommend for babies of all kinds. The range for me was half a city block which surprised me.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for this monitor because the screen never shut off. It was always on. Also the sound activation didn't always work. A few times i was in the living room on one end of the house and he was in his room on the other end. I could see him but when he started to cry there was no sound. It just didn't do what it said it was suppose to. So I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Ourada

customer_reviews.title: Great long distance range but randomly turns off without warning
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor mainly because of the range capabilities and was not disappointed. I was able to be outside throughout my entire yard with a working signal which my other Motorola monitors were not able to reach. However it has turned off randomly without making any noise, twice of which has been at night. We've been using it for almost two months but will be getting something different as our main monitor because obviously we need something reliable that won't shut off randomly when when plugged into the power source.
customer_reviews.author: Paige M.

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: bought this to go with the other monitor that we bought for our first child. it paired up quickly and nicely. Our other unit was roughly 3 years old also. I would buy this camera again if we were to have another child. I like how we can do a spilt screen and watch both rooms at the same time. I am not sure if you can get sound on both cameras at the same time, but our oldest is almost 4, so I wouldn't need to listen into her room since she is big enough to be in there by herself. I would definitely recommend this to a friend who wants a good camera for their child/ren.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: VERY disapointed
customer_reviews.text: was very excited to get this monitor but within the first week the monitor wouldn't stay on. it kept flickering off and on. I tried it on many different outlets. I contacted customer service and their suggestion was for me to mail it to them, they would process it, fix it ( if they found it necessary) and they would send it back to me. I would have been without a monitor for 6-8 weeks. ( was the time limit they gave me) but that it could take up to 12! ridiculous. I ended up returning this monitor and purchasing a different one. :(
customer_reviews.author: jessica williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice dual camera baby monitor.
customer_reviews.text: This baby monitor works good for our kids rooms. Easy to hear them and see them on the video screen. The talk back feature is useful as well. One drawback is the battery life is not as long as it should be. It won't last overnight. We usually have to keep it plugged in to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey K.

customer_reviews.title: Frees Me Up
customer_reviews.text: I keep my grandson five days a week while both of his parents work. I also have a lot of things I like to do--flower garden, play keyboard, etc.--that I can do only while my grandson is asleep or after he leaves. This little device keeps me aware of his every move while I am pursuing my other tasks around the house. In fact, as I type this review, one eye is on the monitor siting to the right of my keyboard. The picture quality isn't great, but it is pretty good, and I can zoom in to see up close. It's worth the money and the peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Backyard Images

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrific product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fir my niece who recently had a baby girl. Vicki reports that this is an excellent product. She can be in another part of the apartment and not have to worry about Miss Lily’s safety.
customer_reviews.author: cruisegirl60

customer_reviews.title: Works well and pairing was easy. The only gripe is that it seems if ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to add on to our exsisting VTech system. Works well and pairing was easy. The only gripe is that it seems if you have batteries in the unit to provide power-outage protection and have it plugged in, during a power blip/outage, it will hang-up so-to-speak and not pair with the parent unit. I've had to sneak into our little ones' bedrooms a few times to reset them both! Otherwise, great camera (and system).
customer_reviews.author: M. Hadden

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love all the features this monitor has. Long battery life, good picture quality, good reception. Especially switching from a monitor I THOUGHT I loved, to this one - very pleased now.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P.

customer_reviews.title: Messed up the audio
customer_reviews.text: I loved my monitor/camera so much that I decided to get a second camera to use with my monitor. That way I could see two rooms. I read negative reviews that stated how adding a second camera messes up the audio. I crossed my fingers and hoped that wouldn't be the case for me. Well, that same thing happened to me as all of the other reviewers said. I removed the new camera in hopes of the audio going back to normal on the first, original one. It didn't. I surely can not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: a customer

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: We bought this with my first child a couple of years ago and decided to buy another one when our second child was born as we're still using the first one. Has a good range- we can use it in our back yard if we're outside while the baby's sleeping. The picture is clear, even when it's dark. The talk back feature is nice when your toddler refuses to lay down... Great quality and worth the price if you're looking for a video monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: broke after a few months of use
customer_reviews.text: We used it for a few months, really like it. And now it just broke, it makes a beeping sound nonstop no matter how many times we reset it. real disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: QI

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitoring system. I basically leave mine on 24/7 ( because I forget to turn it off). I have had it since my son was born. He is 3 an a half and the camera is still going strong! I had my daughter 16 mo. ago and bought an additional camera for her at that time. You can pair up to 4 cameras to the parent device and keep an eye on all of your kids simultaneously. Would highly ecommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rausch

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor! Pros: Color monitor You can turn down the sensitivity so you only hear when your child is crying and not just making sleeping noises Screen turns off until your baby cries (so you don't have a bright light in your face all night) The monitor beeps if the battery is dying. You can zoom in on the baby You can buy another camera separately and hook both up to the same parent unit. Adjustable volume Cons: Directions it comes with doesn't explain everything. You need to go online for more directions.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: The VTech VM321 Safe & Sound Video Baby Monitor was present for daughter in law with 1st baby. Her and our son had researched what they wanted and according to them after using for the 2nd baby it met and exceeded all their expectations. I am sorry I don't have much detail but can say they are still very pleased. Recommend on their word
customer_reviews.author: Jane in Wyoming

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, a little loud
customer_reviews.text: Great wide angle picture. Works great long range. Sound is very clear. Night vs. day lighting is great. Zoom in/out is helpful. Don’t like that even the lowest volume setting is still very loud. Background noise/white noise is loud, especially at night. I wish there was a way to make it a little quieter without putting it on mute.
customer_reviews.author: Tara C

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: This was an add-on camera for us, already having one camera and the monitor unit. The IR LEDs on this one are so bright that at night there is a washed-out area in the center of the screen, whether the camera is pointed at something light-colored or dark. We are going to try covering a few of the LEDs with tape to reduce the brightness of the IR illumination. Otherwise, the camera works just as well as the original does.
customer_reviews.author: AlphieAndWife

customer_reviews.title: Loses signal all the time
customer_reviews.text: The first few months it seemed to work pretty well. Only issue was the sound would cut out randomly for a few seconds on the parent monitor. Vtech does tell you that wifi can interfere with the signal on the, but what it doesn’t say is that if you are streaming even 1 tv the next room over that the parent monitor beeps very loud and loses signal so it can’t even be used if a tv is on in the house at all.
customer_reviews.author: Abel

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have had this unit for over a year now and it still works great. Love that it has night vision and a colored monitor. Only downside I have found is that the sound feature has to be triggered by noise in order to turn on. Would like it if you could leave it on at all times due to it not always turning on when the baby makes noise and sometimes being triggered by passing vehicles. Other than that I am very pleased. As a bonus I can also see the temperature in the room at all times as well.
customer_reviews.author: ScoreTheHotDeals

customer_reviews.title: Security while baby sleeps
customer_reviews.text: This monitor works great! The only drawback is that it's light sensitivity for black & white mode is too low. I can have the light on in baby's room during the day with the blinds on and it still stays in black and white. I have to shine a light directly on it to get it into color mode. However, we mostly use it at night, with the lights off, anyway, and black & white mode still has a clear picture, so it's not a big deal. Everything else works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ramage

customer_reviews.title: buy a video monitor, this one is good.
customer_reviews.text: Wife wanted a video monitor, I wanted to use the hand me down audio only monitor given to us. We used audio only for 2 months. Then my wife broke me and we got this video monitor. What a difference. It saves you 10x the get out of beds. We've had this over 2 years & the battery is still good. Lasts about 4 hrs unplugged (which is long enough to be on the go when they nap). Sound cuts in/out from time to time but I'll take it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B.

customer_reviews.title: I would give it Zero starts If I could
customer_reviews.text: The cameras only worked for a week, and despite having purchased the extended warranty and having reached out to several times for a refund I have received not so much as an email back. Terrible product and terrible customer service. Do NOT by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, after researching many!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great purchase. I put one in each of my boy's rooms. It has a feature so you can talk into the room, this is perfect for my older son. The night vision is great quality. The only thing I don't like about it is the music function. It has the capability of playing a lot of songs, but if you turn it on it cycles through the same song for 15 minutes, and the song is less than a minute long, so it gets old.
customer_reviews.author: Nannerama2020

customer_reviews.title: Best "dont standing up middle of the night" helper
customer_reviews.text: The reason we bought this is because of the baby, everyone I know that bought a video intercom told me to get one, it would save you the trouble to stand up every 3 hours just to see everything is OK. This product has evrything we need, you can be in any part of the house or sleeping and you can talk to your part of the intercom and your baby can hear it to calm he or she down (because it has a microphone intergrated) it has clear video resolution and night vision is automatic activated. It's been great and work with batteries or pluged in.
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: Using as a video monitor for parent
customer_reviews.text: The video screen has good resolution even in the dark/low light. The signal is good, electronics will interfere with transmission if within about 3 feet. The two-talk works great, for both me and my Mom. Nice feature works anywhere in house (2000 sq ft) Best to keep it plugged in instead of relying on battery unless for short periods of use i.e. less than about 3 hours. The camera is adjustable so you can move it vertically. I am considering buying other cameras for other rooms in the house. Use is more than just for babies....great for elder care too!!! Love VTech products, great technology for reasonable prices!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Multi-cam feature is misleading!!
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, but keep in mind that if using this monitor with 2 cameras (for 2 children) there is NO WAY to monitor both children at once. You can SEE both children on the screen at once, but you cannot HEAR them in dual mode. This renders it pointless to me as I can't go to sleep with it by my bedside and rely on it to wake me if a baby cries... I still have to use a second monitor :(. Great monitor if you don't need to watch 2 babies at once or if you only plan to use one camera.
customer_reviews.author: Lzbeth227

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was exactly what we were looking for. We have twins and a camera in watch bedroom. Being able to keep an eye on both of them at the same time is reassuring. The night vision is great, being able to two way talk is helpful. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor for large properties/homes
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased 4 other monitors and this is by far the best range wise. Our home isn't huge, its 2000 sq ft but we have 1/3 of an acre and needed a monitor that could be used in and outside and go through a large number of walls. All the other monitors fell short but this one has fantastic range ... we set it up in our detached garage and are able to run it to the far side of our property through 3 bedrooms walls, a living room and kitchen and it doesn't affect the picture/sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: schhrotts

customer_reviews.title: Failing to work less than a year later.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor set in May of 2018 and already as of January 2019, the night vision has failed on one and the sound doesn't work suddenly on the other. One camera has always had trouble linking to the monitor. Very irritating for such an expensive product. I wrote to the seller, hopefully they will help and I'll update later.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a replacement for another baby monitor that we didn't like as much. This one has been FANTASTIC. The range is strong and the night vision is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Dingman

customer_reviews.title: Every parent's dream!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever!!! Every parent needs this. Previously, I had just used an audio monitor. However, after having a second child who wanted to be held to go to sleep, I needed to be able to keep an eye on my toddler while he was sleeping in his room. The camera doesn't cover the entire room but I knew before I bought it that that would be the case since this model doesn't pan. The fact that it has an intercom is pretty amazing too. It scared the living daylights out of my child at first but he got used to it. I don't know how I survived without this after the birth of my first child!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Makes a loud clicking sound at random. 1-2 times per night
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd baby monitor. Im not very impressed with this model. Way over priced for whet you get. The range is lousy. I had the cheaper version of this model and it had a much better range. I gave this product 2 stars because it works and I like the patrol feature.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: No problems, great unit
customer_reviews.text: This product has been great. It was assembled and working within five minutes of opening. The intercom feature works well. I LOVE that it is encrypted. It easily woke me to alert me that my child was crying. Both of my sister-in-laws were very impressed and are thinking about purchasing. So far, it has been a great deal. Honestly, I don't have twins and I think it is a little absurd to keep a baby monitor in my child's room if she is old enough to go to school, so any issues with multiple cameras won't apply to me.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor. I looked high and low for a video monitor which showed temperature, could be used for multiple cameras and which was sound activated (no white noise present when on lowest volume setting). This monitor also allows for a sensitivity setting. I set ours pretty low for our toddler and when someone is in his room reading a book and just chatting, the monitor tends to NOT pick it up. That's great! The video and sound only come on when there's crying or a loud crash.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Good camera. We have two spanning the whole area of our kids room, from the beds to the door. I like that I can zoom and have a clear view or pan out and see the entire space. Also, I like that I can talk to them through the monitor and remind them its time to sleep and we are watching without having to go in the bedroom constantly. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Love_fate

customer_reviews.title: We have had trouble a few times with the connection ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had trouble a few times with the connection however we found out that it was conflicting with the channel that we had our wifi on. One another time it was kept freezing and we unplugged the camera and replugged and it hasn't been a problem since. I have been using this for about a month so far.
customer_reviews.author: AMT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for monitoring multiple rooms all night!
customer_reviews.text: When our second child was due, we knew we needed a monitor that could handle two rooms. One of our most important features was the ability to scroll back and forth between the two rooms during the night, so we could hear if either (or both!) kids needed something. The VM321-2 handles this extremely well with "Patrol Mode". This feature switches back and forth every 8 seconds between the two cameras. The screen can be switched to the other camera just by depressing the "View" button. We researched many other monitor solutions before settling on this one, and couldn't be happier with our selection.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Awesome monitor!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous monitor! You can see everything baby is doing and hear everything as well. Gives peace of mind while little one is sleeping. You can peak in on them without going into the room and risk waking them up. Let sleeping baby lie! It's portable too so you can take it to Grandma's house. Or better yet, get one for her house too!
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Excelent monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our second baby, after spending $130 on a samsung wireless baby cam (it was awful-you can reed my review also) we decided to go back to basic and purchase a monitor that do not work on WiFi. This monitir have pretty good features like in-display room temperature that comes in handy, the lulabys really soathe the baby (it would be better if the volume could be higher tough), the parent unit has a large color screen and the battery seems to last long enough. The signal is pretty good between the two units even without deploying the antenas
customer_reviews.author: Xtian

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because mother got moved to Hospice before we could really use it.
customer_reviews.author: American Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: We actually bought this to use in our barn for when our miniature horses are about ready to have their colts. This works awesome! We have the moniror inside the barn above the stall and the monitor is in our house. Our barn is quite a distance from our house, we have a garage and swimming pool inbetween the distance of our house and barn. This is quite a distance and the sound and picture is so clear! the infrared works great at night.
customer_reviews.author: chiss

customer_reviews.title: A+++
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this video monitor from VTech. It has a lot of useful features like the temperature alerts for when the room gets to cold or hot. Great battery life when using the monitor unplugged. Picture comes out clear enough that I can see my daughter breathing. Picks up sound really well and has great range. I live in a two story house and it always shows full or nearly full bars in every room. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: These cameras have worked great for keeping an eye on my children. I have a 2 year old that likes to get out of bed a lot during nap time and night time so this allows me to be able to see what he is up to. I also like them when they are playing in their rooms I can get stuff done around the house and still keep an eye on them.
customer_reviews.author: Petitemomma

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the camera, thinking that for a few extra bucks I would be getting a back-up monitor unit in case my identical 3.5-year old unit dies. It doesn't have some "nice to have" fancy features, like remote camera control, but the picture quality, night vision, alert and sensitivity settings are all terrific. It has been a reliable monitor for the past few years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is an absolute joke says it will work 1000 feet away but will not even work on the other side of the house don’t waste your money it’s a ripoff
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: ... this monitor in 2013 and it has held up great! Clear picture
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this monitor in 2013 and it has held up great! Clear picture, long range and music. The monitor finally went out last week (not holding a charge). Would def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin & Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable, will return
customer_reviews.text: This monitor only works about 50% of the time. The parent unit is only about 30 ft from the camera and it cannot find a connection half of the time! As a nervous parent of a young baby this is completely unacceptable. I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: cthor

customer_reviews.title: Everything it says it is.
customer_reviews.text: Reached a 1000 feet which was what we were looking for. The infrared is bizarre, you really can see in the dark with this one. Nice that it's a two way, used it for an 85 yo and put the receiver next door at the son's house.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for over a week now and so far so good. We moved our 2 year old into a full size bed so I needed something to give me peace of mind. It works great! I've not had any issues that other reviewers mentioned. We are only using one camera so I can't review using two cameras. We have a new baby coming in June so we won't find out how it works with 2 cameras until later. I would recommend this to anyone! I almost purchased a more expensive brand but decided to give this one a go and I'm so glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Keel

customer_reviews.title: The BEST system to watch over our loved ones!
customer_reviews.text: We are on our second set! And the reason is because our toddler loves to throw it, but after 2 years of daily and long hours of use, this system is absolutely the BEST. It has the night vision which is absolutely amazing and now we use both cameras (one to watch the toddler and the other to watch the newborn) and the perks are just great! If you are looking for quality and reliability for your peace of mind, look no more.
customer_reviews.author: CsufAlumni08

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind caring for an elderly parent.
customer_reviews.text: This device was purchased so we can hear my dad call or whistle when he needs help or has fallen in his bedroom. This works exceedingly well and gives us all peace of mind. I tested it and it even works if I take the receiving unit across the street to a friends home.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Ok this is an ok system. I honestly think ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok this is an ok system. I honestly think you'll get more for your buck with an IP security camera. The parent unit has a weak charging pin too. Be careful. They don't sell spare parent units... the camera is ok, sometimes has a hard time changing from blk and why to color, or night to day. And I wish the music would play from the parent unit. Other than that it's a solid 3.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 311

customer_reviews.title: So, So.
customer_reviews.text: This product serves the purpose, but a few flaws come with it. The camera has the problem of losing the link with the monitor, and also during the day it switches from color to night mode. And last the sound cuts off and turns on again. These are the cons. The pros are these, when the camera decides to work, the link goes a long way. It's a good product my camera I believe is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Olivas

customer_reviews.title: We love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! We use them for both boys in separate rooms, and you can hear them clearly. We love that you can talk to them through the monitor. You can slightly move the camera and zoom in and out. It plays lullabies. We have zero complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: DocRomeroED

customer_reviews.title: ... eye on the dog outside and my son works great. And after 3yrs outside I
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep an eye on the dog outside and my son works great. And after 3yrs outside I. The cold, rain , and heat it still works
customer_reviews.author: Red fraggle83

customer_reviews.title: Randomly the monitor will lose signal and alert an alarm while resting on my night stand (super awesome in the middle of the nig
customer_reviews.text: We've had the monitor for 6 months and will be having a baby in February, we will be on the hunt for a new video monitor. Randomly the monitor will lose signal and alert an alarm while resting on my night stand (super awesome in the middle of the night while we're sleeping). Also, regardless of it's so call "signal" the screen and sound with intermittently disappear for about a second or 2, the screen will go black. More recently the screen will flip flop between color and night vision randomly and there wont be a change of shadowing or something blocking the camera...mounted well above the bed and outside of reach. Customer service has been less than fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Easy To Use Baby Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Used for three years now. Not complicated to set up, nice display and decent battery life. Music feature is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Fire Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Battery of parental unit did not work
customer_reviews.text: The products works well. Very useful. However, battery that came with parental unit did not work. I had to purchase a new battery to replace a brand new battery that came with a new product. I spent more than 20 dollars in a new battery. Be careful battery could not work. Amazon told me to send the product back. However, because i live outside the United States send it back was to expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Screen won’t turn off!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely returning! We bought this after our vtech monitor took a crap. The last one lasted about 3-4 years so we stuck with the same brand. Picture quality is fine but the VOX doesn’t work! The screen stays on all the time, which is so annoying to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very bad product
customer_reviews.text: We have had this monitor for less than a year and it already does not work. It never worked perfectly to begin with but we thought this was what happens when you do not purchase a top of the line product. Very disappointed and would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deb L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Dad
customer_reviews.text: If you have elderly parents in your care, this is a great device for piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: F.B.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has great picture and sound quality and is portable which we think is great too. Very good purchase and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor
customer_reviews.text: We have had just about every monitor and this is by far the best. We had issues with blocked or lost signal and this one has had no issues. We use the monies in 2 kids rooms UT I would suggest buying even if 1 kid. Can also be used for security cam. Love the patrolling option, temp display, and super easy to use, accuracy of sound. Also, when in mute mode it still displays sound.
customer_reviews.author: Emily M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Extremely simple set up and quality has been very good too!
customer_reviews.author: Agkilroo

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Used it camping, had an rv, did great.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful monitor. The image is very clear and picks up sound very well. It has a lot of options (eg, alarms if temperature gets too low or high). My only criticism is I wish there was a way to turn off the screen to save the battery but yet keep the sound alert on. I end up charging it through the night to make sure that it doesn't die on me overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous monitor.
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific monitor. We originally had a very fancy, very expensive monitor that had very poor picture qualit and no battery life. A friend recommended this one and we couldn't be happier. The picture quality is so clear and the parent base tilts. It's so nice.
customer_reviews.author: mgsmiss

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set
customer_reviews.text: These have held up quite nicely (I bought a second camera to go with it) and the picture and sound is great still after 2 years. easy to use, and it plays music which is nice. I love the feature that allows you to talk to your baby through it as well.
customer_reviews.author: SammyJean

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: Terrific way to watch baby fall asleep without running in and out of the room. I bought this for my daughter-in-law because she has twins. This is really a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an alternative to smart monitors. The trouble is that it constantly goes off signal, turns off on its own and beeps throughout the night. It is not a reliable means for keeping track of baby.
customer_reviews.author: Illinois saver

customer_reviews.title: Use for two kids
customer_reviews.text: I have a 20 month and a 4 month old and I like that I can see both kids either one camera at a time, or both at the same time. It tells me the temp in their rooms and I can control the volume. Also have used the "talk" feature numerous times when my husband was in the kids room and needed to tell him something.
customer_reviews.author: CountryLivingLovers

customer_reviews.title: Parent unit doesn't hold charge
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it is just my unit, but the parent monitor will sometimes not hold the charge even when plugged in. It has now happened 4 times, waking up to crying and the monitor is dead. I have the low battery alert on, but I have not ever heard it go off. Not a good thing when you have a newborn and a toddler to keep an eye on. If this wasn't an issue, I would go back and give it 5 stars. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: A great way to watch your baby
customer_reviews.text: This set up allows great views in total darkness and also views from four cameras. I know how much I appreciate this with a new granddaughter to watch over and it affords so much security with the great video in low light. This was so easy to set up and use. I am now officially the greatest babysitter ever.I can see what is making those sounds and have been relieved!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good replacement, I wish the one I bought with the original package worked as well.
customer_reviews.author: rjkdesign

customer_reviews.title: Great Price-Did Not Hold Up
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Shortly after the original review 2 of the cameras quit working. You could re-pair them with the parent unit but they would show everything in green and then not connect at all. This unit has been returned and we are back to the drawing board. Compared this system to ones from Samsung, Motorola and Summer Infant. The reviews were all similar, people had complaints about all of them. This one won out based on price. We are very pleased with the unit so far. Allows to keep track of the kids in their bedrooms as well as in their play area. Bought extra cameras as well, very pleased with the whole setup especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A_B

product_meta.title: VTech VM321 Video Baby Monitor with Automatic Infrared Night Vision, Adjustable Camera, Zoom, 5 Soothing Lullabies & 1,000 Feet of Range
product_meta.description: Style:Monitor with One CameraSafe & Sounds Full Color Video and Audio Monitor split screen viewing system supports up to four total cameras to be viewed from one parent unit. Viewing modes include single view and quad view split screen to view 4 rooms at the same time.
feature_bullets: This configuration includes one parent unit (monitor) and one baby unit (camera)
High resolution 2.8" color LCD screen - never miss your baby's smile
Automatic IR night vision - view your baby at night without disturbing them
Comfort your infant with the 2-way talk-back intercom or choose to play one of five preset lullabies
Adjustable camera lens - the baby unit camera angle can be easily adjusted, ensuring the best view of your baby
Wall-mountable - the camera includes a wall-mount bracket to easily attach to a wall
This 2.4GHz system digitally transmits audio and video signals up to 1,000 feet
Parent unit can be set to beep if: (1) temperature drops below or rises above your customized zone, (2) link between the parent unit and the baby unit is lost, and/or (3) rechargeable battery is low
6-level sound indicator on the parent unit allows you to visually monitor noise levels even when the unit is muted
Language is preset to English, but can be switched to French or Spanish for all screen displays
Expandable system - up four total cameras (additional cameras sold separately)
The baby unit also includes a cord management system for storing any excess power cord

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars822 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
